meanings.definition: Antipredators: organisms that have adaptations to avoid or defend against predators.
meanings.sent1: Some animals have special features that help them stay safe from antipredators.
meanings.sent2: Birds use camouflage as antipredators to blend in with their surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The clever antipredators outsmarted the hungry fox with their quick thinking.
meanings.sent4: In the game of survival, antipredators are the ultimate protectors against danger.
meanings.sent5: The antipredators' strategies were so effective that they became legends in the animal kingdom.
